              [
                "background-size",
                [
                  ["c"],
                  [
                    "a",
                    "https://www.w3.org/TR/2014/CR-css3-background-20140909/#the-background-size"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [" property enables one to control the scaling of the "],
              ["background-image", [["c"]]],
              [
                ". It takes up to two values, which determine the scale/size of the resulting image in vertical and and horizontal direction. If the property is missing, its deemed "
              ],
              ["auto", [["c"]]],
              [" in both "],
              ["width", [["c"]]],
              [" and "],

            "language": [["HTML"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "<div>\n  <div class=\"contain\"></div>\n  <p>Note the grey background. The image does not cover the whole region, but it's fully <em>contained</em>.\n  </p>\n</div>\n<div>\n  <div class=\"cover\"></div>\n  <p>Note the ducks/geese at the bottom of the image. Most of the water is cut, as well as a part of the sky. You don't see the complete image anymore, but neither do you see any background color; the image <em>covers</em> all of the <code>&lt;div&gt;</code>.</p>\n</div>"
              ]
            ]
          },

          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1551944972034,
          "parent_id": "ed17e4c5-9fe0-4b12-9363-fd50366136a5",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["auto", [["c"]]],
              [
                " will keep the image’s aspect ratio, if it can be determined. The height is optional and can be considered "
              ],
              ["auto", [["c"]]],
              [
                ". Therefore, on a 256 px × 256 px image, all the following "
              ],
              ["background-size", [["c"]]],
              [
                " settings would yield an image with height and width of 50 px:"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

          "version": 1

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "The length or percentage approach isn’t flexible enough to keep the aspect ratio at all times. "
              ],
              ["auto", [["c"]]],
              [
                " doesn’t help, since you might not know which dimension of your element will be larger. However, to cover certain areas with an image (and correct aspect ratio) completely or to contain an image with correct aspect ratio completely in a background area, the values, "
              ],
              ["contain", [["c"]]],
              [" and "],
              ["cover", [["c"]]],
              [" provide the additional functionality."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["CSS"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "background-size: 50px;\nbackground-size: 50px auto; /* same as above */\nbackground-size: auto 50px;\nbackground-size: 50px 50px;"
              ]
